title: Master yi needs to be freaking gutted
body: No champion should auto win the game. because they got sated devourer. and hes not even fucking squishy. he builds sterak + dmp an has well over 3300 hp and a huge freaking shield not including his dumbass meditate which is amazing for tower diving pretty early. why does he get to do fucking 3 kinds of damage there is no way to build agaisnt it. and he melts tanks just as fast as squishy champions.
